skyux_tile_expand._description: Label for expand button in the tile

skyux_tile_help._description: Label for help button in the tile

skyux_tile_settings._description: Label for the settings button in the tile

skyux_tile_grab_handle._description: Label for grab handle in the tile

skyux_tile_grab_handle_instructions._description: Long description for grab handle in the tile
skyux_tile_grab_handle_instructions.message: When focused on a tile's move button, use arrow keys to reorder. Press up and down arrow keys to change position in column. Press left and right arrow keys to change position to another column.

skyux_tile_moved_assistive_text._description: Report of the new location of a recently moved tile
skyux_tile_moved_assistive_text.message: {0} moved. Current column: {1} of {2}. Current position in column: {3} of {4}
